thread.title: Florida lawmakers pass gun, school safety bill

title: Florida lawmakers pass gun, school safety bill
text:
Florida lawmakers pass gun, school safety bill 10:36am EST - 01:40 
Florida lawmakers, spurred by last month’s deadly high school shooting, gave final passage on Wednesday to a bill to raise the legal age for buying rifles, impose a three-day waiting period on all gun sales and allow the arming of some school employees.   
Florida lawmakers, spurred by last month’s deadly high school shooting, gave final passage on Wednesday to a bill to raise the legal age for buying rifles, impose a three-day waiting period on all gun sales and allow the arming of some school employees.  //reut.rs/2IbLgJV
